content.raw:
Ok I found out a bit more. 
It seems to be linked to the window having focus/being active. For some reason windows are not active on first start of a python app on mac. If the window is not active everything works just fine. If the window becomes active (by clicking in it somewhere) tabs become buggy. That also applies to the demo code. So it's not just a BLACS problem anymore.
